column2: there are a few things that are good and others that are mediocre. But what gets me the most is the service. The servers have been great
column3: slow sometimes but good. It's the front desk- the hostesses. They are terrible. They have a terrible attitude
column4: almost like they are too good to help you. And if you ever call in- good luck. They don't want to take any take out orders
column7: and rush you to place an order online when the system isn't even working. I'm over the hype. I won't be coming back.
